title: Negative electrode with surface coated with lithiated zeolite and lithium ion battery using negative electrode

events.title: Application filed by Tianjin EV Energies Co Ltd

classifications.description: Electrodes for accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte, e.g. for lithium-accumulators; Processes of manufacture thereof
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Selection of inactive substances as ingredients for active masses, e.g. binders, fillers
Methods of deposition of the material by coating on electrode collectors

abstract: The invention discloses a negative electrode with the surface coated with lithiated zeolite and a lithium ion battery using the negative electrode. The negative electrode comprises a negative electrode plate and a lithiated zeolite coating, wherein the lithiated zeolite coating comprises 95-98% (by weight percent) of lithiated zeolite and 2-5% (by weight percent) of a binder; slurry of the lithiated zeolite coating also comprises a solvent; the solvent is N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone (NMP) or acetone; two surfaces of the negative electrode plate are coated with the slurry of the lithiated zeolite coating; the binder is polyvinylidene fluoride (PVDF) or P(VDF-HFP). The lithiated zeolite coating provided by the invention is relatively large in resistance, the safety of the battery can be improved, a migration passage is provided for lithium ions by a porous structure of the lithiated zeolite, the rate capability and the low temperature performance of the battery can be ensured, the lithiated zeolite coating has the strong absorption on water and gas, and can maintain the interface uniformity between each electrode and each membrane, and the cycle life of the battery is prolonged.
claims: 1. a lithiumation zeolite table is coated with negative pole, it is characterized in that: described lithiumation zeolite table is coated with negative pole and comprises negative plate and lithiumation zeolite coating, described lithiumation zeolite coating comprises lithiumation zeolite 95-98%(weight ratio), binding agent 2%-5%(weight ratio), the slurry of described lithiumation zeolite coating also comprises solvent, described solvent is NMP or acetone, and the slurry of described lithiumation zeolite coating is coated in negative plate two sides; Described binding agent is PVDF or P (VDF-HFP).
2. lithiumation zeolite table according to claim 1 is coated with negative pole, it is characterized in that: the solids content of the slurry of described lithiumation zeolite coating is 20%-60%.

3. lithiumation zeolite table according to claim 1 is coated with negative pole, it is characterized in that: the average grain diameter D50 of described lithiumation zeolite is 100-2000nm, and pore size is 3A or 4A.
4. lithiumation zeolite table according to claim 1 is coated with negative pole, it is characterized in that: the one side thickness of described lithiumation zeolite coating is 1-5um.

5. a lithium ion battery for lithiumation zeolite table painting negative pole described in right to use requirement 1-4, is characterized in that: described lithium ion battery comprises positive pole, negative pole, barrier film, electrolyte,
      Described positive pole comprises metal collector, positive electrode active materials 90-97%(weight ratio), conductive agent, binding agent, described positive electrode active materials is one or more in cobalt acid lithium, nickle cobalt lithium manganate, LiMn2O4, LiFePO4, described conductive agent is one or both the combination in carbon black, electrically conductive graphite, and described binding agent is PVDF;
      Described negative pole is that the lithiumation zeolite table described in claim 1-4 any one is coated with negative pole;
      Described barrier film is the one in polyolefin micropore barrier diaphragm, nonwoven fabrics barrier film, PVDF barrier film, ceramic diaphragm, fibre diaphragm;
      Described electrolyte comprises electrolyte lithium salts, electrolyte solvent, film for additive, and described electrolyte lithium salts is LiPF
          6, LiBF
          4, LiClO
          4, LiBOB, LiN (CF
          3sO
          2)
          2, Li (CF
          3sO
          2)
          3in one or more combination; Described electrolyte solvent is ethylene carbonate (EC), propene carbonate (PC), butylene, ɑ-butyrolactone, ɑ-valerolactone, dimethyl carbonate (DMC), diethyl carbonate (DEC), methyl ethyl carbonate (EMC), diethoxyethane, 1, the combination of two or more in 3-dioxolane; Described film for additive is one or more the combination in vinylene carbonate (VC), propylene sulfite (PS), maleic anhydride.

6. the described lithiumation zeolite of use according to claim 5 table is coated with the lithium ion battery of negative pole, it is characterized in that: described membrane thicknesses is 7--25um, and porosity is 25%--60%.
